title: Is there a place to easily find people to play with?
body: These boards are kinda slow and sometimes I wanna play in a group to get keys and chests. Is there like, a club or a discord or something for OCE?

replies.body:
There are a couple of dedicated groups and servers that have this kind of purpose. 

The[ League community serve](https://discord.gg/0gqfewWcRxU8di5X)r - ran by the boards volunteers has hundreds of people from each server, just get your role and you will have access to the OCE lfg channel

The [oceanic discord server](https://discord.gg/trEHP8t) - ran by some dudes, everyone on the server is from oce. Quality memes. 

Summoners society - discord is still a bit quiet, although people are almost always up for games. They also have a very large [facebook ](https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/)page where people often look for pals.

There a quite a few more, but off the top of my head these are usually the go-to places.
